profiles:
Summary I am a user experience designer that has spent the past three years creating user centered design and functionality for multinationals, local government, and small start-ups, working in both Waterfall and Agile methodologies. I have designed ecommerce functionality for healthcare sites; developed intranet applications that increased employee efficiency, engagement, and revenue; created personas; created new information architectures; worked with graphic designers to create style guides; and have designed sites that work on desktop and mobile devices. 
 
I run the PDX UX Book Club, and am co-lead of IxDA Portland. Specialties:Wireframing, sketching, user research, competitive analysis, heuristic evaluation, information architecture design, usability testing. Summary Interaction Designer with a passion for delivering valuable services to consumers.  
 
Collaborate across disciplines to create a vision and strategy for a product or service. Envision how disparate components come together to build a user experience and affect user behavior. Communicate insights through visual models. 
 
Facilitate and participate in the design process from ideation to implementation. Utilize social media tools to learn about upcoming trends and methods while sharing knowledge and ideas with colleagues. Specialties:user centered design, systems thinking, concept sketching, storyboarding, paper prototyping, fast iterations Summary Interaction Designer with a passion for delivering valuable services to consumers.
